content.35/f Penny 1000/p Penny: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer -30 30 0 Penny 12 7 0 Pam -100 -100 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyMess/viewport 12 7 true/pause 1000/speak Penny "呃……這裡好髒。$s"/pause 500/warp farmer 12 9/playSound doorClose/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/emote Penny 16/pause 300/speak Penny "@！呃……抱歉，這裡很亂，我正準備打掃來著的。$u"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 600/emote Penny 32/pause 300/speak Penny "你要幫我嗎？你是說真的嗎？$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Penny "你可以從那裡開始。我打掃廚房。"/move farmer 2 0 1/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 1 0 1/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/animate farmer false true 100 35/pause 200/playSound dwop/removeSprite 16 6/pause 200/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1200/stopAnimation Penny/removeSprite 10 5/playSound dwop/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/pause 900/animate farmer false true 100 41/pause 300/playSound dwop/removeSprite 15 5/stopAnimation farmer/pause 1400/stopAnimation Penny/move Penny 1 0 0/pause 800/warp Pam 12 9/playSound doorClose/stopMusic/move Pam 0 -1 0/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Pam 1/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 3/speak Pam "你在幹什麼？！$u"/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Pam 3/faceDirection Pam 0/speak Pam "停！別亂動我的東西！$u"/move Penny 2 0 2/pause 500/emote Penny 28/pause 500/speak Penny "母親，這屋子實在是太髒亂了。 @ 和我想打掃一下。#$b#*嗅嗅* *嗅嗅*……你剛剛在酒館嗎？怎麼身上一股酒味？$s"/pause 300/move Pam -1 0 3/emote Pam 12/pause 400/speak Pam "我去哪裡跟你無關！$4"/pause 500/speak Penny "這當然與我有關！我不希望你毀了你自己！$a#$b#難道說你沒有意識到，你的所作所為也會影響我嗎？能不能不要這麼自私！$a"/faceDirection Pam 0/shake Pam 5000/pause 600/speak Pam "自私？我給你吃給你穿，如今你倒說我自私！？你這個不懂感恩的小……$u"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -2 0 2/move farmer 0 2 3/pause 500/speak Pam "你快走吧。很抱歉讓你見到了這一幕。$4"/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 2/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/warp farmer -40 -40/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Pam 0 -1 1/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 3/speak Pam "他是個好人……^她是個好人……"/speak Pam "我不希望你讓別人來打掃我的屋子！這很丟人的好嗎？你明白嗎？$4"/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 600/showFrame Penny 23/pause 700/speak Penny "……我知道了，媽媽。$s"/pause 1000/mail PennyCleanTrailer/end warpOut
content.36/f Penny 1500/p Penny: musicboxsong/9 7/farmer -30 30 0 Penny 9 7 0/skippable/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 12 9/pause 400/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 300/speak Penny "@，你來的正好！#$b#我馬上就要完成我的新料理了！$h"/pause 400/move farmer 0 -2 3/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Penny "再一下下就好。"/pause 200/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 200/animate Penny false true 120 29 30/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/stopAnimation Penny/pause 500/playSound openBox/showFrame Penny 29/pause 400/playSound furnace/showFrame Penny 30/pause 1500/playSound clank/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1 true/showFrame Penny 28/speak Penny "來，給你嚐嚐。"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/farmerEat 200/showFrame Penny 4/pause 2500/stopAnimation farmer/pause 500/playSound gulp/animate farmer false true 350 104 105/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite pennyCook/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak Penny "$q 72 null#……怎麼樣？#$r 72 50 event_cook1#（說謊）嗯嗯！真好吃！#$r 73 -50 event_cook2#呃……我能把剩下的帶走嗎？#$r 73 0 event_cook3#真是特別的味道……你是怎麼把它做得那麼耐人尋味的？"/pause 500/speak Penny "$p 72#嘿，既然你是第一個嘗這道菜的人，我準備給這道菜起名叫“辣 @”。$h|好吧，我想這次料理失敗了……$s"/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 600/speak Penny "呃……所以我們要不要一起看個電影什麼的？"/pause 500/move farmer 5 0 0 true/move Penny 5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Penny "謝謝你幫我試菜。$h"
content.963313/n pamPotatoJuice: playful/10 7/farmer -100 -100 0 Pam 10 7 0/mail pamNewChannel/skippable/pause 3000/speak Pam "嘿嘿……我看到東西送到了。$h"/pause 500/speak Pam "來嚐嚐看吧。$h"/pause 1000/playSound coin/showFrame Pam 32/pause 2000/animate Pam false true 400 33 34/playSound glug/pause 800/playSound glug/pause 800/playSound glug/pause 800/playSound glug/pause 790/stopAnimation Pam/showFrame Pam 32/pause 400/emote Pam 40/pause 800/showFrame Pam 35/textAboveHead Pam "呸！"/playSound slimedead/shake Pam 2000/pause 2000/animate Pam false true 400 28 29/speak Pam "我要的是馬鈴薯，不是發酵的狒狒的腎！$u"/pause 2000/end dialogue Pam "果汁？嗯，我試過了，孩子。 $4#$b#嘗起來怎麼樣？……有些事情還是不說為妙。我們就不要多談了。$4"
